data.title: Janet Asimov Book & Series List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Janet Asimov's books & series in order (16 books) (1 series). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.
data.text:
The Norby Chronicles

1983

/ Science Fiction

JEFF WELLS BOUGHT THE CHEAPEST USED ROBOT HE COULD FIND ... It was just a dusty, old tin-can of a robot--with no guarantee. But Jeff only needed it to teach him Martian Colony Swahili before he got expelled from the Space Academy Jeff Wells did...

Norby: Robot for Hire

1985

/ Science Fiction

THREE CHEERS FOR NORBY! Norby's the bravest, most outrageous, most lovable robot ever to save the day Along with his ever-faithful human companion Jeff, and a mischievous All-Purpose-Pet named Oola, the three blast off for interstellar adventure. ...

Mind Transfer

Feb-1988

/ Science Fiction

A robot with human essence and a scientist's family escape to a space colony, after the scientist is murdered by human fundamentalists on Earth, and create a society in which humans, robot/humans, and aliens, peacefully co-exist...

Norby Through Time and Space

Sep-1988

/ Science Fiction

NORBY IS AT IT AGAIN! That lovable mixed-up robot is back--and in more trouble than ever! Along with his sometimes fearless human companion, Jeff Wells, Norby has gotten himself into more trouble than would seem humanly--or robotically--possible. ...

Pshrinks Anonymous

May-1990

/ Science Fiction

TRICKS OF THE MIND-- OR SOMETHING MORE? Each month the members of an exclusive club get together in the heart of Manhattan to trade some very unusual tales. The club is Pshrinks Anonymous, where psychiatrists of every school analyze their most int...

Norby and the Court Jester

Oct-1991

/ Science Fiction

Anticipating nothing but fun during spring break at the Space Academy, Jeff Wells and his robot, Norby, prepare to visit their friend Pera, but their plans are disrupted when Pera is attacked by an evil court jester. Reprint....

Murder at the Galactic Writers' Society

Jan-1995

/ Fantasy

When a meeting of the Galactic Writers' Society is threatened by a series of embarrassing, potentially deadly incidents, it is up to Arda, an android undercover agent, to solve the mystery and find the culprits before the crimes undermine interstella...

Norby the Mixed-Up Robot

Jan-2010

/ Science Fiction / Fantasy

Meet Norby -- he wants to help, but he's one mixed-up robot! When Space Academy cadet Jeff Wells needs tutoring for his course in Martian Swahili, he goes looking for a robot teacher. Norby possesses not only the usual robot skills but also an extr...
